name: Party Size Penalty Manager - No XP Loss override
author: DoesntPlayAnymore

posts.author: DoesntPlayAnymore
posts.content:
Plug and play for single player campaigns. No need to open the module or anything like that. 

This script periodically adjusts a single player module's xp scale to accurately offset loss of XP from Party Size Penalty.

Link: https://neverwintervault.org/project/nw ... s-override

posts.author: DoesntPlayAnymore
posts.content:
Orion2019 wrote: Congrats! Thanks for doing this. Hopefully some of the module creators will make use of the work you have done! 
Oooh, nono, this is for players like you and me. It's plug and play for single player campaigns, no need to open the module or anything like that. I should clarify that in the OP and project description. 
For module creators that want to mess with the xp system I suggest using a more powerful XP overhaul system. 
It looks like the NWN vault guys were much quicker at doing the tech stuff of installing the scripts etc than I was, in fact they seemed so impressed they uploaded it immediately? :)
Actually, a different solution that works for both v1.69 and and EE: So instead of using the exclusive-to-EE function AddEvent to call a script on a player character's Heartbeat Event (just a script that fires every 6 seconds) user TheBarbarian showed me a different script he had come up with (link to topic: https://forum.neverwintervault.org/t/ne ... -ee/2164/3)

Basically, he "fakes" the heart beat even with a function that calls it self with a delay in a loop if a flag value is present on the Player. It's simple and elegant and worked immediately when applied.

The beautiful thing is: Nothing is actually overridden. The script is it's completely own little thing and doesn't mess with anything other than the XPScale.
